page.title: 07Housing in Alsager
page.content: Alsager has a population of 11,300. Each house has approximatly 1800squ feet.The houses have 7-8 rooms . Alsagers soil is mainly sand,clay. The houses are split up into two categories .50% detached 50% semi detached.The average price of a house is Â£35,000 .Estate agents sell about 1,200 houses a year.The main type of heating is gas.There are council houses in Cedar Ave,Station Road, Shady Grove and Coronation Ave.We have 850 council houses. Most people moved to Alsager because of its easy access to the Potteries,closeness to the M6,good education and a pleasant area.Crewe Rd is the only main road in Alsager.We have plenty of primary schools ,one Secondary school and a higher education college. By A.Stone,P.Watson,S.Talbot Form 1SH
